subject.text: Subject of the announcement to be added

message.text: Message to be given in the announcement

expiryDate.text: Expiry date of the Announcement given in specified format

emailList.text: Email IDs to send notification (multiple emails can be separated with comma)

notify.text: if true is given - mail notification will be sent to the people in the given locations/ if locations is not given, the mail notification will be sent to all locations; if false is given - no email notification is sent

isSticky.text: if true is given then it is added as a sticky announcement; if false is given then it is added as an announcement

isCommentDisable.text: if true is given then adding comment is disabled for the user; if false is given then adding comment is enabled for the user
